name: get_2_convert_endpoint
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool currenciesexchangerateapi.
Tool description: CurrenciesRatesAPI is a RESTful API that provides currency conversion and exchange rate information.This API is organized around REST. Our API has predictable resource-oriented URLs, accepts form-encoded request bodies, returns JSON-encoded responses.
API description: Endpoint URL: /convert?to=USD&from=EUR&amount=100&date=2023-02-01
HTTP Method: GET
Request Parameters:
'to': The target currency symbol. (Required)
'from': The source currency symbol. (Required)
'amount': The amount to be converted. (Required)
'date': 
Response: This endpoint returns the converted amount and the exchange rate used for the conversion in JSON format.

amount.description: The amount of currency to be converted.

date.description: The date for the historical exchange rate. Defaults to None.
